Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience and efficiency. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these aspects, I propose a special introductory price of $75 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a high-quality product at a discounted rate. Please let me know if this offer suits your needs. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
